text: Fernando Ciangherotti Jr. (born September 6, 1959) is a Mexican television soap opera actor. He is the son of Fernando Luján. Spouse: Alejandra Avalos (divorce) Karla Betancourt Children: 2 (son Andrea-Francesco, daughter Aisha) ==External links== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male telenovela actors Category:Mexican people of Italian descent Category:Male actors from Mexico City Category:Male actors of Italian descent
title: Fernando Ciangherotti
